code: // todo(hendrikm): workaround, see // https://github.com/elastic/machine-learning-cpp/issues/123 protected void fillCommandBuffer() throws IOException {     char[] spaces = new char[FLUSH_SPACES_LENGTH].     Arrays.fill(spaces, ' ').     writeMessage(new String(spaces)). }

comment: /**  * Transform the supplied control message to length encoded values and  * write to the OutputStream.  *  * @param message The control message to write.  */
code: /**  * Transform the supplied control message to length encoded values and  * write to the OutputStream.  *  * @param message The control message to write.  */ protected void writeMessage(String message) throws IOException {     lengthEncodedWriter.writeNumFields(numberOfFields).     // Write blank values for all fields other than the control field     for (int i = 1. i < numberOfFields. ++i) {         lengthEncodedWriter.writeField("").     }     // The control field comes last     lengthEncodedWriter.writeField(message). }
